Strange Flying Cat
Young Witch
Hello, you must be the witch in-training Ada, right ?
Yup! and you are, Mr. Cat ? *Pat*
Hey, hey stop treating me like I'm a little kitten, would' ya?
I'm Lino,a witch cat, and I'm 150 years old! From now on, we'll be partner, I'll be your navigator and also your mentor!
Is that so? Cool! I'm counting on you then, Lino !
Okay, since it's your first day here, we'll start with the basics!

As delivery witches, our task is to deliver candies to every forest sprite's houses, forest sprites likes candy very much so we deliver candy to them in exchange for their blessings for our land's prosperity
This is how forest sprite's house looks like.
To complete our task you'll command your magic broom to perform actions.
In order to command your magic broom,you'll grab a piece from command bar bellow...
...then drop them to function container on the right side
Move command will make your magic broom move forward
Interact command will make your magic broom to stop for a while so you can interact with object in front of you (i.e. delivering candy to a house)
When you're done, press PLAY button and your magic broom will perform actions as you planned before.
Let's give it a try shall we ?
Okay!
Sorry, can you repeat your explanation?
Let's goo! Delivery Witch Ada reporting for duty!
So that's it?
Yup, good job! easy peasy wasn't it?
Yup! and I'm ready for more!
Now now, that's the spirit, young lady! Let's move on to next area then!
Hm, there's intersection in this area and houses are located on the roadside, so I'll introduce you with some new commands
The Left command will make your magic broom turns to the left (counter clockwise)...
...while Right command will make it turns to the right (clockwise).
Oh! I also noticed there's a house with numbers on its top, that means we'll need to deliver candy to them before the timer runs out, or else, forest sprites will be angry to us...
Eh? that's scary! what if I failed to deliver candy to any one of them and they're angry? what am I going to do ?!
Don't worry ! just press the REWIND button, I'll revert back the time with my time magic !
Oh, I'm so glad having you as my partner here, Lino!
And remember, we need to deliver candies to ALL houses in the area, got it ?
Yup! let's do this !
Err.. explain it one more time maybe?

Hmm, lemme get this straight, first, we can turn either left or right with LEFT and RIGHT command, second, in order to do a delivery for houses on the roadside we need to turn either left or right before interacting with them...
...third, we'll need to deliver candies to houses with timer before the timer runs out ?, fourth, You'll revert back the time for me when I press the rewind button ?
Yup! you got it! Good luck!
Okay then, lets do it!
Done!
Good job! let's move to the next area then!
Eh, what's that, Lino ?
That's teleporter, a hole that splices time and space. how uncommon a teleporter spawned near a village vicinity like this
A teleporter, huh ? So what did it do ?
In short, it will let you travel from one position to another position in a speed of light when you interact with it, we should use it for our advantage !
Ah, so how do we know where will this teleporter leads us to ?
No, we don't, we'll only know when we've tried it ourself. It can also leads us to Netherworld where every demons live too !
Eh! so you were trying to kill me when you say 'we should use it' ?
Hahaha, no, no I was kidding for the Netherworld part ! It will need a very very huge teleporter hole to lead us to Netherworld, small teleporter like this won't travel that far !
Linoo!!
Hahaha, c'mon, where's your sense of humor?
Oh by the way, some teleporter may have a finite amount of lifetime before it goes dead, you can't interact with dead teleporter like this...
... and some teleporter might be regaining its energy and came to life again after some time,so we need to really pay attention to numbers on top of it
And you can use your time magic to revert back the time when we got stuck inside the teleporter, can you ?
Yup! my time magic can still work without exception, all you need to do is just press the rewind button anytime you want. Got it ?
Yup!
One more time,please...
Sweet! lets go try that one immediately
Woohoo! what a ride in there !
Hahaha...
Look at those distance, Lino! I don't think my function container can handle that much command! What should we do ?
Hm, looks like it's time to teach you about functions.. We've been using main function all the time, correct ?
Yup! but it can only contain up to 10 commands, I don't think we can finish this area with only 10 commands !
Well, we won't do it with only 10 commands ! you'll need to create new functions and then link those to your existing main function!
To create a new function, you've got to press the ADD NEW FUNCTION button...
There'll be a new F1 piece bellow your normal command bar..
Yup! and then ?
Then you'll use it to link your newly created Function 1 to your existing Main Function, shall we try it now ?
Sure!
Ah.. explain it one more time, please!
Ah! so that's how,thanks again, Lino !
Nevermind, lets continue to the next area !
Hey, Ada, did you know that we can also loop through function ?
Eh, how to do it ?
Simply, link its respective piece to its own function container, lets try it!
Ah, that's handy!
Welcome to editor mode ! In this mode you can create map as you wish! you can also share your maps, share it with your friends, and challenge him/her to solve your map !
Wow ! This looks fun ! I'd make a map that no one could ever beat !
Have fun !
Bill Gates, founder of Microsoft earns $1,000 every 4 seconds.
in: Bill Gates, pemilik dari Microsoft berpenghasilan 1000 dollar AS setiap 4 detik!

en: Early electronic computers, developed around the 1940â€™s, were the size of a large room and consumed huge amounts of electricity.
in: Komputer modern pertama yang diciptakan sekitar tahun 1940-an berukuran sebesar ruangan dan membutuhkan daya listrik yang sangat besar !

en: Computers are programmed to carry out instructions. These instructions are usually very simple and require adding numbers together, moving data from one place to another etc.
in: Komputer di program untuk menjalankan instruksi. Instruksi-instruksi ini umumnya sangat simpel seperti melakukan perhitungan angka,atau memindahkan data dari suatu tempatke tempat lain!

en: Did you know that world's first computer programmer was female ? and her name was Ada Lovelace !
in: Tahukah kamu programer pertama di dunia adalah seorang perempuan ? dan nama programer tersebut adalah Ada Lovelace !

en: The first computer was an abacus. Invented in Babylon in 500 B.C.
in: Komputer pertama di dunia adalah sebuah sempoa, ditemukan di Babilonia pada tahun 500 Sebelum Masehi
